sourcesContent:
import Chart from "./Chart"
function ExpenseChart(props){
    const chartDataPoints = [
        {label: 'Jan' , value:0},
        {label: 'Feb' , value:0},
        {label: 'Mar' , value:0},
        {label: 'Apr' , value:0},
        {label: 'May' , value:0},
        {label: 'Jun' , value:0},
        {label: 'Jul' , value:0},
        {label: 'Aug' , value:0},
        {label: 'Sep' , value:0},
        {label: 'Oct' , value:0},
        {label: 'Nov' , value:0},
        {label: 'Dec' , value:0},
    ]

    for(const expense of props.items){
        const monthIndex = expense.date.getMonth();
        chartDataPoints[monthIndex].value += expense.amount;
    }
    console.log(chartDataPoints)
    return <Chart dataPoints={chartDataPoints}></Chart>
}
export default ExpenseChart
